titles.title: Congress 2012 Commission Act
To establish a commission to make recommendations on the appropriate size of membership of the House of Representatives and the method by which Members are elected.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1371)
Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
6/26/2008--Introduced.
Congress 2012 Commission Act - Establishes the Congress 2012 Commission to make proposals to the President and Congress regarding changes in the size of the membership of, and the method of electing Representatives to, the House of Representatives.
